website_summaries.verdict: An affordable corner sink that is popular with renovators.
pros: Fits well into corners and it is simple to install on your own
cons: The size of the sink is much smaller than expected
but for the budget price you may not mind

customer_reviews.title: Great corner sink!
customer_reviews.text: Update, yes I purchased a second sink to to for the remodel our half bath. I was so happy with the first sink I knew it would be the optimal choice. Perfect fit for our 1930's home. We remodeled our Jack and Jill bath and this sink was perfect. We had to get inventive to install the sink, due to our old house NOT the sink itself, it looks amazing. It almost matches photos of the original sink.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a small upstairs "powder bath," basically a closet-sized room renovated as a bathroom. This sink was a great space saver and looks great to boot. Our corners were night quite square so we ended up building in some extra supports to hold the weight, but it all turned out well and glad to have this.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Davisson

customer_reviews.title: Renovate in good conscience.
customer_reviews.text: This corner sink is exactly what was ordered. It will look amazing in our renovation project. It does have a flat area on the bottom so that if one would want, it could have a cabinet underneath (custom made of course with a curved front.) It was packaged and shipped well; no damage at all.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Have older house with half bath. Had looked looked everywhere for a small corner sink. This one fit perfectly and looks like it has always been there. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Truthseeker

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Not cast plumb,square or straight. Nightmare to try to install and get it to look right. Poorly engineered brackets. After long frustrating layout and mounting, noticed pea sized chip previously filled in front rim,ugh! No time to return, will have to live with. Nice shape, similar to original '29 Kohler. Other than the chip, glaze was good. Price right, shape right, quality lacking.
customer_reviews.author: timothy g.

customer_reviews.title: and installed easily with the provided brackets
customer_reviews.text: We converted our laundry room into a bathroom, and needed a small sink. This corner sink worked perfectly and gave us even more space in the small room. It came well packaged, and installed easily with the provided brackets. I recommend for anyone needing to add or change a sink in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: mx219

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we expected. Installed this a month ago and it’s looking and working great. We received a first one within 3 days of ordering. However, it was cracked. Returned it and received a new one with no problem. Very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: treather

customer_reviews.title: Good sink
customer_reviews.text: Product and dimensions as advertised. However, keep in mind at a standard 34 inch mount, the bottom of the bowl is higher than most sinks. Make sure you get a long drain pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Sink is exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: We have not installed the sink as yet. I ordered it for a small bathroom we have. It arrived on time as promised, undamaged, and is exactly what I wanted. It is a very pretty sink.
customer_reviews.author: A Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sink is really pretty and well made it was shipped very well
customer_reviews.text: The sink is really pretty and well made it was shipped very well. It is a little smaller than I expected so be sure and check the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Great little sink
customer_reviews.text: fits nice, good quality, hangers installed easily, and it holds water!! what more do u want!
customer_reviews.author: charles munday

customer_reviews.title: Sink arrives safely
customer_reviews.text: The sink is still in the box awaiting installation. It looked great when we temporarily removed it from the box. Delivery was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time in perfect condition. I was able to unpack and install it in about an hour. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice corner sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is very nice, has nice styling and looks great in the powder room. It arrived when promised and was packaged well. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Maryhat

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOOK AND FIT
customer_reviews.text: ARRIVED ON TIME, GREAT LOOK AND FIT, EASY TO INSTALL
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Bass

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid lav, but no hardware is supplied
customer_reviews.text: The lav arrived well packed and in good shape. The finish is very nice, but the installation instructions were terrible. The mounting brackets were supplied but there was no hardware. In addition, the lav does not come with lag bolts. Lag bolts through the back corner of the lav are required to mount the sink securely.
customer_reviews.author: DJC1959

customer_reviews.title: Very nice buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and was packaged securely. The sink is nicer than I expected. I love the decorative edge and there is room for soap.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Packaging
customer_reviews.text: It came broken in a million pieces and now I have to deal with it
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and love the small size perfect for our under the stairs bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Verrydt

customer_reviews.title: Low price was consistent with quality
customer_reviews.text: This corner sink is usable; however, alignment (way off axis) of upper and lower drain seals where so far off, extraordinary attention was required to seal drain plumbing, and the final drain pipe sits at a noticeable angle.
customer_reviews.author: randy lavigne

product_meta.title: Portsmouth 22" Corner Wall Mount Bathroom Sink In White With Overflow And Bracket Grade A Porcelain Renovators Supply Manufacturing
product_meta.description: Color:White - Classy Design SinkThis ""Portsmouth"" wall mount corner sink from Renovator's Supply is a compact sink designed with space conservation in mind. This corner sink is ideal for maximizing space in a crowded bathroom. Features: - Beautiful, durable and easy to clean sink constructed from grade A vitreous china. - Finished with our proprietary Reno-Gloss coating for stain and scratch resistance. - Ergonomic design principles mean this sink slots into your corner to take up very little space while remaining comfortable. - Modern yet classic plumbing design sensibilities bring a touch of elegance to your bathroom. Other Details: - Installation Style of Corner Wall Mount Features Authentic Renovator's Supply Logo.
feature_bullets: Small Space Saving Corner Wall Mounted Sink
Grade A Porcelain Ceramic Scratch and Stain Resistant
7" High x 22" Wide x 22" Proj...Includes Bracket for Install
Portsmouth Timeless Modern Design Compliments many Bath Renovations
4" Centerset Pre-Drilled Faucet Holes (Faucet Not Included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars58 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
